class manager.ranking_manager.RankingManager[source]#

Bases: Manager

Classe permettant de gérer le ranking

update_ranking(date: int, videogame_id: int, coordonnees: str, distance: str) → dict[int, str][source]#

Met à jour le ranking

Parameters:

  • date (int) – la date à partir de laquelle on veut récupérer les tournois

  • videogame_id (int) – l’id du jeu-vidéo

  • coordonnees (str) – les coordonnées de la ville

  • distance (str) – la distance autour de la ville

Returns:

en clé l’id du joueur et en valeur le joueur en lui-même

Return type:

dict[int, str]

Bases: Manager

add_audited_game(game: Videogame)[source]#

Add a video game to the audited games.

Parameters:

game (VideoGame) – The video game to add.

Raises:

DuplicateGame – If the game already exists.

delete_audited_game(game: Videogame)[source]#

Delete a video game from the audited games.

Parameters:

game (VideoGame) – The video game to delete.

Raises:

GameNotAudited – If the game does not exist.

get_all_video_game()[source]#

Get all video games from the StartGG API.

Returns:

List of video games.

Return type:

list

Raises:

HTTPError – If the request fails.

The video game.

Return type:

list_audited_game()[source]#

List all audited games.

Returns:

List of audited games.

Return type:

list

Raises:

GameNotAudited – If there are no audited games.
